

// Before 25 in models we hade
"invoice": {
    "type": "sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel",
    "uri": "model/Invoices.json"
}
"invoice": {
                                "dataSource": "invoiceRemote"
                        }
Which was from local file model which was converted to oData model with the URL : https://services.odata.org/V2/Northwind/Northwind.svc/
